attributes.background: Cancel college exams for this year due to the pandemic as college students have not gotten enough help and support by teacher

rejection.details:
On 4 January the Prime Minister stated that it is not possible or fair for all exams to go ahead this summer as normal, and that the Education Secretary will work with Ofqual to put in place alternative arrangements: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Cancel GCSE and A-levels in 2021 replace with Course Work and Teacher Assessment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564696

Deciding whether to hold mock exams is a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.
